content: Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information about the Douce River in Dominica. It is a river in Dominica and is listed in the "List of rivers of Dominica". The article also includes links to resources for learning more about the river and its location. There are no interesting facts provided in the text.
